amendment.description: Amendment provides $1.2 million of EPA Hazardous Substance Superfund funding for use by the Agency for Toxic Substances and Disease Registry to conduct a health effects study of the Toms River cancer cluster in New Jersey.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds appropriated in the bill for Hazardous Substance Superfund by $1.2 million and to specify that the funds be allocated for a study by the Agency for Toxic Substances and Disease of the Toms River Cancer Cluster in the Toms River area of New Jersey.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lewis (CA) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
